Interface MessageSender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServerController, ServerController, ServerReceiver, ServerReceiver

    public interface MessageSender
    Interface used for sending messages to server.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky
    See Also:
    com.iha.emulator.communication.server.ssl

      • sendMessage

        java.lang.String sendMessage(org.dom4j.Document message,
                             ResponseTracker responseTracker,
                             OutMessage.Type type)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             WrongResponseException
        Method used for sending message to server.
        Parameters:
        message - Dom4j XML document with message for server

        type - message type
        Returns:
        server response
        Throws:
